projects.title: Dr. iQ
projects.bodyText:
- Dr. iQ is a free app for NHS patients that provides fast, safe, and effective online GP consultations, reducing the need to book and wait for a face- to-face appointment buit in Swift.
 -  You can access Dr. iQ on any Apple mobile phone, from wherever you are.
 - Online Doctor Consultations.
 -  No need to wait in the queue. Submit an online consultation about any issue or query that you have, and a member of the practice team will assist you via the app, saving you time and reducing the need for a face-to-face appointment.
 -  You can securely view information stored on your medical record such as your repeat medication list, allergies, vaccinations and test results, at your convenience.
 -  Order your regular repeat medication and arrange collection directly from a pharmacy of your choice.

projects.title: GLOBALSHOPAHOLIC
projects.bodyText:
- Global shopaholics is a logistics company that is providing its services, across the global.
 - We connect you, our valued customer, to brands, shops and sellers, of your choice so that you can shop free of the worry of any delivery roadblocks.

projects.title: ORONIZE
projects.bodyText:
- Orgonize is an event management app, which will let you buy tickets for events, enter in competitions and buy special offers that are offered by Businesses.
 - This app will let you connect with friends, chatting with friends and event organisers.
 - This app will also let you earn as a business ambassador.
 - You can get guest pass or VIP pass for the event.
 - Orgonize will let you connect your college, clubs, unions and society and can post the events happening in your colleges.
 - Students can join the college by providing the email of college in app.
